entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:25 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 09:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -24.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -27.3°C
Wind: WNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
